Text: Phone call WednesdayI am sending you a business plan for a financial SettlementMatrix This is a marketplace that will handle all payments settlements and riskarbitrage associated with BB marketplaces I would like to discuss the potential for Enron to participate as an equity owner in SettlementMatrix We are moving this very rapidly I will discuss this with you when we talk on Wednesday Regards Greg See attached file SettlementMatrix Business Planvzip SettlementMatrix Business Planvzip
